thread.title: Trump faces tough questions at bipartisan NH event
thread.title_full: Trump faces tough questions at bipartisan NH event - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jill Colvin and Holly Ramer, Associated Press
title: Trump faces tough questions at bipartisan NH event
text: Photo: Jim Cole, AP Former Democratic vice presidential candidate, former Connecticut Sen. Joe Lieberman, an No Labels co-chairman, introduces Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump to speak at a No Labels Problem Solver convention, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Manchester, N.H. Former Democratic vice presidential candidate, former Connecticut... MANCHESTER, N.H. (AP) — Independent-minded voters in politically important New Hampshire challenged Donald Trump Monday on his "divisive" style and his attitude toward women. Former Democratic vice presidential candidate, former Connecticut Sen. Joe Lieberman, an No Labels co-chairman, introduces Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump to speak at a No Labels Problem Solver convention, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Manchester, N.H. Former Democratic vice presidential candidate, former Connecticut... MANCHESTER, N.H. (AP) — Independent-minded voters in politically important New Hampshire challenged Donald Trump Monday on his "divisive" style and his attitude toward women.
